**2022-02-23 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons**

**Accepted**

- **crypto/x509: add ParseRevocationList, deprecate ParseCRL & ParseDERCRL** [#50674](https://golang.org/issue/50674)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **cmd/go: make fuzzing a first class citizen, like tests or benchmarks** [#19109](https://golang.org/issue/19109)
  - duplicate of #44551
- **cmd/vet: warn about \`// go:...\`** [#50898](https://golang.org/issue/50898)
  - duplicate of #43698
- **go/types: export term/termlist logic** [#50963](https://golang.org/issue/50963)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **crypto/tls: expose all presented certs in error type on handshake failure** [#48152](https://golang.org/issue/48152)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **go/ast: add Range token.Pos to RangeStmt** [#50429](https://golang.org/issue/50429)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **sync/atomic: add typed atomic values** [#50860](https://golang.org/issue/50860)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **encoding/base64: add Encoding.EncodeString to match DecodeString** [#51295](https://golang.org/issue/51295)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **net, os, syscall, internal/poll: Add ControlWith, ReadWith, WriteWith to RawConn interface** [#51170](https://golang.org/issue/51170)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **runtime/cgo: move built-in C helpers from cmd/cgo to runtime/cgo** [#51134](https://golang.org/issue/51134)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Active**

- **arena:  new package providing memory arenas** [#51317](https://golang.org/issue/51317)
  - added to minutes
- **bufio: add Reader.Buffer** [#50960](https://golang.org/issue/50960)
  - discussion ongoing
- **cmd/go: go test should always fuzz a bit even without -fuzz** [#50969](https://golang.org/issue/50969)
  - commented
- **cmd/go: stamp the pseudo-version in builds generated by \`go build\`** [#50603](https://golang.org/issue/50603)
  - discussion ongoing

  - added to minutes

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing

  - commented
- **fmt: add Formatter fallback** [#51195](https://golang.org/issue/51195)
  - discussion ongoing
- **go/doc: improve headings, lists, and links** [#51082](https://golang.org/issue/51082)
  - discussion ongoing
- **hash/maphash: add Sum** [#42710](https://golang.org/issue/42710)
  - taken off hold

  - commented
- **net/http/httputil: better support for forwarded headers** [#50465](https://golang.org/issue/50465)
  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing

  - taken off hold

  - discussion ongoing
- **runtime: use MiniDumpWriteDump for GOTRACEBACK=crash on Windows** [#49471](https://golang.org/issue/49471)
  - retitled
- **sort: add Find** [#50340](https://golang.org/issue/50340)
  - commented
- **strings: add Lines** [#51039](https://golang.org/issue/51039)
  - commented

  - added to minutes
  - commented
